column4: anyone know of a comprehensive xorg config i could try for my out of the box ubuntu install? after the kernel boots and it looks like the screen rez is about to change, my lcd goes blank
hey what kind of card do you have
ati radeon
what model
Radeon X800PRO
ringin bells?
can you paste you xorg
should be in /etc/X11/? xorg.conf ? nothing's there for some reason. had to boot the machine into rescue mode to ssh into it... if that makes a difference.
well that is your first problem give me one sec I will give you a direction on how to reconfigure x
i'd just like to ssh into the box for all intents and purposes
well what exactly are are you trying to do with this machine
raw storage. have it up and running just to samba into it.
well then i suggest you go download ubuntu server and install that it will not install a GUI
if i just remove the x packages though?
not exactly sure what package would have to be removed
what is torrentflux
torrentflux  a PHP based, feature-rich Torrent download manager
it installs itself somewhere.... i need to get it into var/www
what you trying to do
sudo su ... just doesn't prompt me to put in the new root password
are you trying to set a password to root
i did already
i can ssh as root... just cant sudo
well if you are logged in as root why do you need sudo
